data.eml:eml: Four new species of giant pill-millipedes from Vietnam (Sphaerotheriida, Zephroniidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Semenyuk, Irina, Golovatch, Sergei I., Wesener, Thomas (2018): Four new species of giant pill-millipedes from Vietnam (Sphaerotheriida, Zephroniidae). Zootaxa 4459 (3): 535-550, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4459.3.7
